body:
```
$ spack install intel-mkl
==> Installing intel-mkl
==> Using cached archive: /home/davydden/spack/var/spack/cache/intel-mkl/intel-mkl-2018.0.128.tgz
==> Already staged intel-mkl-2018.0.128-f2aygb65imstkffscogshw66npramhrk in /home/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/intel-mkl-2018.0.128-f2aygb65imstkffscogshw66npramhrk
==> No patches needed for intel-mkl
==> Building intel-mkl [IntelPackage]
==> Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 4:
    './install.sh' '--silent' 'silent.cfg'
See build log for details:
  /home/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/intel-mkl-2018.0.128-f2aygb65imstkffscogshw66npramhrk/l_mkl_2018.0.128/spack-build.out
```
with
```
==> Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Executing phase: 'install'
==> './install.sh' '--silent' 'silent.cfg'
Another instance of the installation program has been detected. Please quit the 
other instance and try again.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
```

This used to be working just a while ago, it certainly worked in September with 8db69de2583d4f8ff5b20041e3eba68780cbd05b

@lee218llnl any ideas?
title: intel-mkl fails to install
